titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President and directing Attorney General Merrick B. Garland to transmit, respectively, a copy of the affidavit to the House of Representatives related to the raid on the former President.

Of inquiry requesting the President and directing Attorney General Merrick B. Garland to transmit, respectively, a copy of the affidavit to the House of Representatives related to the raid on the former President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 20 - 14.
Reported adversely (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 117-491.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 111.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution requests President Biden, and directs Attorney General Garland, to transmit to the House of Representatives a copy of the affidavit submitted for the warrant on former President Trump, to the extent that any such affidavit is within the possession of the President or the Department of Justice.
